code: import axios from'axios';import{useMutation,useQuery}from'react-query';import{validateAccountHolderName,validateEmail,validateName,validateOfferList,validatePhoneNumber}from'@utils/validator';import{validateForm}from'@utils/validateUtils';export const useGetRestaurentsApi=request=>{return useQuery(['get_restaurents',request],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_restaurant_detail/",params:request}));};export const useGetRestaurentsDetailsApi=id=>{return useQuery(['get_restaurents_details',id],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_restaurant_detail/".concat(id,"/")}),{cacheTime:0});};export const useGetRestaurentsCountApi=()=>{return useQuery(['get_restaurents_count'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/dashboard_restaurant_count/"}));};export const useGetRestaurentsOtherDetailApi=id=>{return useQuery(['get_restaurant_other_detail'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_restaurant_other_detail/".concat(id,"/")}));};export const useSetDocumentStatusApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/update_document_status/",data:info.request}));};export const useChangeStatusApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/change_onboarding_status/",data:info.request}));};export const useChangeRestaurantStatusApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/change_restaurant_status/",data:info.request}));};export const useUpdateRestaurantDetailsApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>{const formData=new FormData();Object.keys(info.request).forEach(l=>{if(!(l==='applicable_days')){formData.append(l,info.request[l]);}});if(info.request.applicable_days)formData.append('applicable_days',JSON.stringify(info.request.applicable_days));return axios({method:'POST',url:"/update_restaurant/".concat(info.id,"/"),data:formData});});};export const useChangeOnboardingStatusApi=()=>{return useMutation(info=>axios({method:'POST',url:"/change_onboarding_status/",data:info.request}),{});};export const useGetRestaurentsMenusApi=(id,request)=>{return useQuery(['get_menu_list_admin',id,request],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_menu_list_admin/".concat(id,"/"),params:request}));};export const validateAddRestoFields=(fieldName,formData)=>{switch(fieldName){case'res_acc_holder_name':return validateAccountHolderName(formData[fieldName]);case'manager_name':return validateName(formData[fieldName]);case'manager_no':return validatePhoneNumber(formData[fieldName]);case'owner_email':return validateEmail(formData[fieldName]);case'offer_list':return validateOfferList(formData[fieldName]);default:return'';}};export const validateAddRestoForm=formData=>validateForm(formData,validateAddRestoFields);export const useGetRestaurentsTransactionApi=id=>{return useQuery(['get_transaction_restaurant'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/get_transaction_restaurant/".concat(id,"/")}));};export const useGetRestaurentsTransactionCountApi=id=>{return useQuery(['dashboard_transaction_count'],()=>axios({method:'GET',url:"/dashboard_transaction_count/".concat(id,"/")}));};
